alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 3:06AM EST until January 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Western Chippewa, Central Chippewa, Southeast Chippewa, Western Mackinac and Eastern Mackinac Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this evening`s and Wednesday morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet snow is expected to arrive this evening before transitioning to freezing drizzle overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac
